astro/

redshift_axis.pro


top source redshift_axis

Astro

redshift_axis, z, xaxis=xaxis, yaxis=yaxis, h100=h100, omegam=omegam, omegalambda=omegalambda, lookback=lookback, _extra=_extra

For a plotting coordinate system that is set up in terms of cosmic time in Gyr, adds a redshift axis.

Parameters

z in

Array of redshifts at which to label axis.

Keywords

xaxis in

XAXIS=0 for a lower x-axis, XAXIS=1 for an upper x-axis.

yaxis in

YAXIS=0 for a left y-axis, YAXIS=1, for a right y-axis.

h100 in

Hubble parameter in units of 100 km/s/Mpc. Required.

omegam in

Total matter density at z=0. Required.

omegalambda in

Total vacuum energy density at z=0. Required.

lookback in

Time is in lookback time (default is time since Big Bang).

_extra in

Extra keywords are passed to AXIS procedure.

Examples

FIXME
